page.title: 05 TRANSPORT
page.content: A lot of people have their own{cars in this village. Half the families never use the{bus services.}This is because the{buses}do not run every day and so people need{cars}to get to work. Two{cars}are needed in a lot of families because both the adults go to work. Most families have at least one{car. There are weekly bus services to {Ashbourne, Derby}and{Matlock}and twice a week to{Wirksworth.}The{buses}are mainly used by older people to go shopping but some of the{buses}go from Moor Lane along Blackwall Lane and do not come into the village. This makes it difficult for some older people from the bottom end of the village to use the{buses. The service to{Derby}is used most often, followed by{Wirksworth,}with{ {Matlock}and{Ashbourne}used equally.
